title: CS Lewis Miracles 1b, Future telling and John Brown's prophecy of the Civil War
description:
Can God reveal the future to someone? Why do we think about this the way we do? Why the peer pressure?

CS Lewis Miracles Audiobook https://www.audible.com/pd/Religion-Spirituality/Miracles-Audiobook/B002V8KS3S
